job.title: Senior Software Test Engineer - Remote
job.description: strongJob DescriptionbrbrstrongTrueCar envisions a world where car shopping is an uplifting experience Our shopping experience helps buyers consider choices from every angle builds confidence in their decisions and enables every step of the process with tools and information that make car buying easy Ultimately TrueCar is helping people in the second largest purchase they will make in their lives Were removing the complexity out of buying a car using technology and personalization to create a oneofakind experience that transforms car buying and ultimately peoples livesbrbrCome join the team and help us accomplish our mission TrueCar maintains a Dynamic Workplace allowing employees to have their primary workstations at home with office space in Santa Monica CA and Austin TX to be made available to individuals and teams to use as needed Employees enjoy excellent benefits healthvisiondental coverage 401k with contribution matching equity etc as well as perks like monthly credits for athome food delivery internetmobile phone service coverage fitness expenses and BabysitterNanny supportbrbrstrongstrongAbout the job brstrongstrongulliWork in a focused and nimble team that collaborates on common problems across all products and areas of focus and helps to ensure quality is an integral part of the development processliliContribute to the architecture of our automation platform for our web interfaces API and mobile platformsliliCreate and maintain suites of automated tests from planning to implementation for web API and Data ProcessesliliProduce documentation for automated features and cross train with other engineersliliMentor team members in building higher technical skill setsliliParticipate in technical design andor architectural discussions for new featuresliliEffectively uses available monitoring toolsliliParticipate in code reviews and provide constructive and creative feedback to help improve overall code qualitybrbrliulstrongWhat youll needbrstrongulliProficiency in at least one modern objectoriented or scripting programming language such as Java JavaScript Python or RubyliliExperience with designing and building automation frameworkliliProficiency in working with at least one open source automation tools such as Cypress Selenium WebDriver or Watir TestNGliliDesigning and creating robust automated test scripts to address business amp technical use cases and writes maintainable codeliliExperience with testing in CICD environment and familiarity with pipeline integrationliliConstant collaboration with Software Engineers and Product managers to ensure proper testing coverageliliExperience working in Agile development process Scrum Kanban ScrumbanliliExperience with GitHub JIRA Confluence SlackliliConsistently follows best practices able to defend technical decisions in code review feedbackliliHighly motivated selflearnerliliAbility to work in a fast paced environmentliliDemonstrated ability to successfully handle multiple demands and short deadlines experience in resolving conflicts and dealing with shifting prioritiesbrbrliulstrongNice to havebrstrongulliDeep understanding of Restful API Design GraphQL is a plusliliExperience working with databases such as PostgresbrbrliulstrongAbout TrueCar brbrstrongTrueCar is a leading automotive digital marketplace that enables car buyers to connect to our nationwide network of Certified Dealers We are building the industrys most personalized and efficient car buying experience as we seek to bring more of the purchasing process online Consumers who visit our marketplace will find a suite of vehicle discovery tools price ratings and market context on new and used cars  all with a clear view of whats a great deal When they are ready TrueCar will enable them to connect with a local Certified Dealer who shares in our belief that truth transparency and fairness are the foundation of a great car buying experience As part of our marketplace TrueCar powers carbuying programs for over 250 leading brands including AARP Sams Club and American Express Nearly half of all newcar buyers engage with TrueCar powered sites where they buy smarter and drive happierbrbrTrueCar is headquartered in Santa Monica California with offices in Austin TexasbrbrbrstrongLocationsstrongSanta Monica CAAustin TXbrbr
